mapper.select: SELECT t.id,t.name,t.price,t.recruitNum,t.desc,t.detailAddress,t.releaseTime,t.userId,t.pointLat,t.pointLon ,m.url ,city.id AS cityid,city.name AS cityname ,u.userName,u.mobile ,j.id AS typeid,j.name AS typename FROM task t LEFT JOIN user u ON t.userId = u.userId LEFT JOIN jobtype j ON t.jobTypeId = j.id LEFT JOIN system_acer_code city ON t.areaId = city.id LEFT JOIN task_img m ON t.id = m.taskId ORDER BY releaseTime DESC LIMIT #{0},#{1}
